title: Chester Jenkins
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320123010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320123010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Chester Jenkins**

aka "chester"  
b. 1971 in [Montréal](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320123010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Montreal), [Canada](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320123010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Canada)

Selected published types:  
FF Schmelvetica  
Eclogues  
Pixella  
Freedumb  
Galaxie Polaris

Selected published types, collaborations:  
Infinity (with Rick Valicenti)  
Apex Sans (with Rick Valicenti)  
Alexey (with Rick Valicenti)  
Apex Serif (with Rick Valicenti)  
Orbit (with Rick Valicenti & Robb Irrgang)

Co-founder with Tracy Jenkins of [Village](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320123010/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Village).
